alert.note: Alert for Imperial Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 15 at 12:15PM PST until February 16 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Imperial Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
